mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, name, password, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT user_id, email, name, password, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0
